title: Live Caption on Pixel 2 XL
content: On 15th Jan 2020, there was an update to Device Personalization Services that was supposed to bring Live Captions on Pixel 2 and Pixel 2 XL. I got an update for Device Personalization Services Version 2.8.286596096, but don't have Live Captions enabled yet. Is there anything else required for it to work?
